almalinux-8.description: AlmaLinux 8 64-bit image with just essential packages installed. Built to run on bhyve or KVM virtual machines.

almalinux-9.description: AlmaLinux 9 64-bit image with just essential packages installed. Built to run on bhyve or KVM virtual machines.

debian-11.description: Debian 11 (bullseye) 64-bit image with just essential packages installed. Built to run on bhyve or KVM virtual machines.

debian-12.description: Debian 12 (bookworm) 64-bit image with just essential packages installed. Built to run on bhyve or KVM virtual machines.

rhel-9.description: RedHat Enterprise Linux 9 64-bit image with just essential packages installed. Does not include entitlement. Built to run on bhyve only.

oraclelinux-8.desc: Oracle Linux 8 64-bit image with just essential packages installed. Built to run on bhyve or KVM virtual machines.

oraclelinux-9.desc: Oracle Linux 9 64-bit image with just essential packages installed. Built to run on bhyve or KVM virtual machines.

rocky-8.description: Rocky 8 64-bit image with just essential packages installed. Built to run on bhyve or KVM virtual machines.

rocky-9.description: Rocky 9 64-bit image with just essential packages installed. Built to run on bhyve or KVM virtual machines.

ubuntu-20.04.description: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (Focal Fossa). Built to run on bhyve or KVM virtual machines.

ubuntu-22.04.description: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (Jammy Jellyfish). Built to run on bhyve or KVM virtual machines.

ubuntu-24.04.description: Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (Noble Numbat). Built to run on bhyve or KVM virtual machines.
